dkeep.logic

Interface GameLogic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DungeonLevel, KeepLevel, Level

    public interface GameLogic
    Author:
    João Mendes interface for the game logic

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      CellPosition getHeroPosition()
      gets the level's hero position
      boolean isHeroDead()
      checks if hero's level is dead

    • Method Detail

      • updateGame

        boolean updateGame(Direction move)
        issues hero's move and updates game elements
        Parameters:
        move - direction to move hero
        Returns:
        true if won level, otherwise is still playing or was defeated

        checks if hero's level is dead
